content.detailedDescription: Cant describe in writing
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Circle,   Disc,   Fireball,   Flash,   Sphere,   Star-like
content.summary: Orbs and other objects doing all the tricks in the book

content.detailedDescription: I was looking thro. front window,cam-corder on tripod in hall and saw ''star'' not twinkling whizz by about 200ft.Max.Away 100ft. alt.500-700mph.Going sne.Have filmed many going past at less speed and will be able to upload to you-tube or mufon soon.Alien craft are of many types
content.summary: Various alien craft filmed

content.detailedDescription: Outside on deck at 11pm on phone having a cig.  looked up, saw a bright light that looked out of place!  i'm in view on the vancouver international airport - i see planes come and go.  this stayed stationary.  yet hovered to the west slowly.  grabbed binoculars, others came out, watched in amazement as it seemed that there were military planes that were flying by in what usually is not a typical pattern for landing in vancouver.  low flying planes....Perhaps military deployed to watch this sphere!  ufo had blue red and white lights....For over an hour - we all watched, also on the phone, other witness' were watching this too!  the fog clouds started to come from the west, and the orb started to disappear.  this was 100% not a plane nor a helicopter.
content.summary: 2 orbs...Hovering, red, blue white lights flashing.  1.5 hrs - 3 military planes circling it.  convinced its a  ufo! 4 witness'!

content.detailedDescription: Outside on deck at 11pm on phone having a cig.  looked up, saw a bright light that looked out of place!  i'm in view on the vancouver international airport - i see planes come and go.  this stayed stationary.  yet hovered to the west slowly.  grabbed binoculars, others came out, watched in amazement as it seemed that there were military planes that were flying by in what usually is not a typical pattern for landing in vancouver.  low flying planes....Perhaps military deployed to watch this sphere!  ufo had blue red and white lights....For over an hour - we all watched, also on the phone, other witness' were watching this too!  the fog clouds started to come from the west, and the orb started to disappear.  this was 100% not a plane nor a helicopter.
content.summary: 2 orbs...Hovering, red, blue white lights flashing.  1.5 hrs - 3 military planes circling it.  convinced its a  ufo! 4 witness'!

content.detailedDescription:
I was looking out my window towards the south/south east sky when i noticed lights in the sky that seemed to be an airplane to me. after watching it for a few minutes i realized it was not an airplane or helicopter...This was approx 1:30 am est. as i watched it more, it would move up, move down, very quickly and precisely. it would hover, it was high up in the sky. after watching it for awhile i ran outside with a pair of binoculars to try to get a better visual on it. it seemed to be moving farther away from my sight. as i went outside to watch it i couldn't find it. so i went back inside to the window i was watching it from and it was still there, so after getting my bearings back down on where to look, i went back outside. as i looked up, it took off...As in, there was a streak of light, almost like a shooting start, but this was a straight path across the night sky. it went right across orions belt heading west. at that point i knew it was to be an unknown flying object.
i like to look up at the night sky, and on clear nights like these you can see a lot of the stars. this is not the first time i had observed a ufo in the sky. i was just laying in bed watching tv and looked out the window when i noticed the strange lights.
it appeared to me it was very high up in the sky, and after watching it make its maneuvers i realized it was not an airplane or helicopter. i was excited to see it in the sky and just watched it. this is not the first time i have seen objects in the sky that display this type of behavior.
content.summary: Object in sky, watched it hover and zig zag some, then it left

content.detailedDescription: We were camping at my cousins property and he said the area was a hot bed for ufo activity since we not to far from phoenix. we all looked up and started watching. pretty soon we all saw a starlike object it moved from west to east at a pretty fast rate then stopped made a 90 degree angle move a little bit the another 90 degree angle and continued moving west. we also saw another one same type about 20 minutes later. it was moving the same way west to east. and it stopped started glowing and took off at amazing speed.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: We were camping and saw something weird.

content.detailedDescription:
Happened to glance out the front window and saw an orangish object in the sky.  was not an airplane, or any other object i have ever seen.  went outside to get a better look.  appeared to be "flaming".  don't know how else to describe it, but it was not flaming like a meteor or something on fire.  the object was above the tall trees, below a heavy cloud cover.  the shape was somewhat squarish, and the best description i could give was it looked like a paper bag on fire floating in the sky, but the fire did not consume whatever the object was.  i could see 4 or 5 reddish lines eminating from the center of the object to the rear.  wish i had had a pair of binoculars handy!  it was very quiet and seemed to "drift" across the sky in a northerly direction.  it most appeared like a scrap of paper one might see coming from a chimney, in color and the way it seemed to float, but was definitely not anything i have ever seen in my 56 years!  it did not perform and acrobatics or zoom away and was alone....Did not see any other aircraft in the sky.  

as far as my feelings, i was curious to see what it might be, but was not afraid in any way...It had a peaceful feeling to it....Did not appear threatening in any way.  i lost sight of the object as it went behind tall trees to the northeast.  if i had been thinking i would have grabbed my cell phone and attempted to photograph.
content.summary: Appeared to be a flaming object, but was not

content.detailedDescription:
Walked outside to car at 7;15pm aprox when i saw hanging in the sky a large diamond shaped object with a red or white light at the top and the same on the bottom

at least the size of a house hanging low in the sky over a residential area in south salinas

no sound no motion

when i got into car to try and get closer i could no longer see it after parking
my cae a few blocks away

another person i told of this sighting said they also saw something with their girlfriend in the 
same aprox time and locatiion
content.summary: Diamond shaped craft the size of house or larger hanging silently low in sky

content.detailedDescription:
I took a photo in the south of france, nice for the view and later on that day when i viewed the image on my laptop i noticed an image on the upper right corner. 

at first i thought it was a spec of dirt but the lens was clean.
on zooming in i thought the shape looked almost disc like with a glow around it.

i have no idea what it is to this day
content.summary: Noticed disc shaped object on photo after taking picture

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving south on us 31 going from muskegon to grand haven michigan.
i was passanger, my wife was driving.
a flash and orange light/glow attracted my attention. 
as i looked to the west, an orange sphere was passing into the cloud layer. its path of direction was at an angle of around 70 degrees. its speed was faster than aircraft i feel.
it flashed again after passing into the cloud layer lighting up the the underside of the clouds and this light quickly ended.
content.summary: Orange ball

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were sitting in front of the house smoking a cigarette. we noticed the airplanes flying over then noticed a ball of light flying just as high as the airplanes but without the blinking and going the opposite direction of the airplanes. when i first saw the object i looked for blinking lights but because there weren't any i immediately realized it was a ufo.   it just moved in a pretty straight line through the sky then the light faded out pretty quickly. my girlfriend were pretty calm because of how far and hard to see it was.
content.summary: Saw the orb of light like ufo flying above an airplane going in the opposite direction then faded out

content.detailedDescription: I was driving along gus eckert road on the way to work, driving north. i saw a red object at a low altitude (that is what made me notice it and its size). i thought was a banner or balloon, but is wasn���t moving and there was no airplane or helicopter around.  about 10 minutes later i saw a helicopter flying in the sky (but it was actually moving and getting further) that was black.  the object i saw had a reflection because of the sun.  it looked shiny and not dull like the helicopter.  it was not moving when i saw it.
content.summary: Saw a reflective, red object at low altitude

content.detailedDescription:
18:15 11/23/11
yucaipa, ca
chapman heights & cramer rd.
looking southwest
appeared to be at about 3,000 ft
observed a pulsing red light, period about 1/sec, traveling southwest at 3,000ft.
observed two brighter white lights that appeared to descend from the red light, trailing sparks.
red light disappeared, and white lights appeared to disappear on the ground with no apparent secondary explosions, about 7 to 10 miles southwest of observation point.
content.summary: Red pulsing light

content.detailedDescription: I was out jogging on the 12th as i normally do on the weekends. i decided to jog a nature trail located over in guilford county. i started my run at about 8am and stopped to rest at about 9:30am. i saw something down the trail from me. it was short like a midget and it was white and had a metalic colored suit on. it was just standing there looking at me. i had not seen anyone else that morning on the trail. i thought it was just another individual ahead of me that had stopped to rest. i get up and continue down the trail. i look at my watch and it was approx. 9:45am. that is all i remember doing. when i woke up, i was back in my car. it was almost 11am. i can still see the dwarf in my memory. i keep repeating it over and over in my head, tryng to remember what happened. i can't remember anything other than being very tired when i woke up in my car and having a small cut just behind my left ear. i wish i could remember more.
content.summary: I was abducted by a dwarf like being with milky white skin and metalic like jumpsuit

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo sighting - testimony

gentlemen,

i would like to present my testimony about the sightings of ufos, i had to witness the amazing surprise when observing the moon through an amateur telescope.

the reason that leads me to present this document is in the hope that, through its dissemination, it is possible to find new witnesses - which certainly exist - and thus, consolidate and confirm the truth of fact.

echoing the other testimonies and proven, i hope to contribute to the official recognition of this extraordinary and transformative reality that is alien presence on earth.

i am an agronomist, graduated from the federal university of lavras (ufla), and working in indigenous communities in the amazon since 1998. currently, i live in s���o paulo-sp, and despite what may seem, during the 13 years he has worked in favor of said local sightings, such as the amazon rainforest, have never witnessed any phenomenon that could be classified as alien nature. this fact does not make me a skeptic, however, doubt has always been a constant when i encountered it.

but now i am forced, in his own eyes, to recognize that we are actually visited by beings who at least have a sufficiently advanced technology to move into space at great speed. other questions and implications that raises the issue, i dare not speculate, i reserve just beginning research on a sincere search for the deeper truth of the ufo phenomenon.

my recent interest in ufo's, began in april 2011, when i attended the 7th meeting of ufology, in the city of peru���be, south coast of sp. later, i had the pleasure of attending the lecture entitled "the alien presence in the space program," delivered in the house counselor in sp in the month of july.

the phenomenon in question took place on august 6, 2011, at around 23:00 / 23:30, and had a maximum duration of approximately 06 seconds only. i was on top of ed indiana, 5 floors, located in the borough of brooklyn, south of sao paulo, with a bezel (pictured) brand yamato (d = 60mm and f = 700mm, objective 6mm h), preparing to focus on the moon, which was, on occasion, currently the fourth-growing.
specs brand yamata
 

just when it focused on the moon, an object colored black crossed in the right corner of the field of view telescope, vertically from top to bottom, relatively close to the lunar surface at a speed not too fast nor too slow, accompanied by an interesting trail also faded to black pass (with photo design. 1). the photos below were taken shortly after the sighting.

 
photo to drawing. 1

absolutely confused by what he had seen, i adjusted a bit more field of view when the object again crossed the lunar surface, this time, horizontally, from left to right at the bottom of the telescope's field of view, apparently at the same speed, followed the trail also black (photo with drawing. 2).
 

photo to drawing. 2

at this point believing that the phenomenon could be repeated, adjusted the telescope's field of view in order to fill it completely with the view of the moon, in order to better observe and describe the object, or what could be. at the same instant, the object once again crosses the entire center of the telescope's field of view, more or less near the "equator" of the moon, leaving its trail at a speed equal to the other two appearances (photo with drawing. 3). at that moment, i noticed, though blurred, a disk-shaped dome of the object.
 

photo to drawing. 3

gentlemen, deny or doubt the existence of such objects would be to deny the operation of my own eyes or at least admit that i have vision problems grim-faced, if not worse, of sanity.

i ask that in order to help me pass information about similar sightings or even witnesses who had this astounding vision. i would like to share this experience, which is significantly changing paradigms internal personal imprint even spiritual.

i believe it was not the only one to observe the phenomenon. someone who, at the same time, was focused with an instrument, amateur or professional, certainly had the same experience. finding such a person would be essential to support further testimony, giving it the credibility it deserves so that we can consolidate this reality.

i thank for your time and look back.

marcelo cantu���rio gusm���o
content.summary: Ufo sighting - testimony

content.detailedDescription:
Thought this might be associated with the kc mo sightings..

date: july 4, 2010
time: between 9:30 p.M. and 10:00 p.M.

i saw 2 bright yellowish lights flying parole to each other going from south west to north east all going more or less the same speed over st charles mo. their speed was fairly steady and somewhat slow, then 5 min later saw i saw 2 bright yellowish lights surrounded by orange glow flying parole to each other then about 5 min later saw a larger one by itself surrounded by orang flickering glow. i talked some friends in wentsville mo they saw the same thing.

i couldn't hear any noise associated with them, not even from those which flew nearly overhead.



i made a flash depiction of what i saw, photographed the exact area where they flew right over my head.  here is the link


[link moved to field investigator section/cms/tg]

thank you

[name, email, and url removed/cms/tg]
content.shape: Cone,   Cylinder,   Fireball,   Flash,   Sphere,   Star-like
content.summary: I saw 2 bright yellowish lights flying parole to each other going from south west to north east

content.detailedDescription: On october 4, 2011, at about  8:45-9:00 p.M. at spring lake park, near jefferson, iowa, i and a retired methodist minister friend were sitting around the campfire when we saw a mixture of red & blue lights moving fast and erratically,doing right-angle turns and zigzags as it moved from nw to se.  we watched for 3-4 minutes until it disappeared from view.  we guessed the altitude at 30,000-35,000 feet.  degrees up we estimated at 45-50 degrees.  we could not see structure.  the apparent size might be a baby aspirin, and the transit i've estimated at 18 inches, which would be approximately 45 degrees.  observing the zigzag movement of the object, my friend and i turned to each other and said, "that's not an airplane; that's a ufo!"
content.summary: Mixture of red & blue lights moving fast & erratically, right angle turns & zigzag

content.detailedDescription: i ran outside to see what it was, forgetting about my new camcorder of course, and watched as it flew straight towards me then over my house, barely clearing the treetops. it was shaped like a triangle, with red, green , and white lights flashing and pulsating all over the underside of it. it sounded like a hum/whir and moved steadily across the sky. it was absolutely breathtaking!
content.summary: I saw a bright light coming from the nw toward my home.

content.detailedDescription: Hi! wow! i was dumping trash at 10pm pst. just after it had briefly rained. i noticed a bright full or nearly full moon above.  just admiring the moon and the multitude of visible stars.  as i looked straight up slightly east towards moon. my right eye caught an object flying higher than a small plane,  much larger too. but below where high flying jets always approach lax all the time. i lived here 30 years. always looking for this shooting stars etc. this was not from this earth!  not an airplane. looked like a type of luminous jelly fish. translucent. perhaps the bright moon light covered this ufo with enough reflection to see what might not have been visible otherwise.  i grabbed my cellphone, but fumbled trying to get a picture dammit! im hoping someone else saw it too. it flew like a wavy butterfly but east to west very fast. although it looked like it was just floating without effort. like a jelly fish or butterfly.  i searched the net for similar sightings.  found none quite like the one i saw. it could have been saucer shaped but the aura made it appear alive! or lifelike. im 60 years old and in excellent health and have great vision. no mistake.  i was shook up for the next few days alot.  every night i'd go out prepared with camera and scope.  nothing since.  it was so real and unearthly. again on november 12 2011 pst 10 pm sharp. g.A. calif.
content.summary: Saw a translucent large shoe sole shaped posibly a biological? craft that traveled east to west

content.detailedDescription: I was a security officer on duty at the pekin high school east campus building on the hill. i was sitting on the bench by the entranceway which was glass doors and large windows,eating my lunch,around 3:30 am when i looked out to the parking lot and noticed that one of the pole lights was larger than the rest.I thought that's weird.I thought that i would get a closer look so i laid my sandwich down and stepped up to the glass door.My breath started fogging up the glass making it harder to see the light so i opened the door and stepped outside while holding the door so that it would not close and lock me out.Immediately i noticed how quiet it was outside,the only sounds that i could hear was the sparse traffic on the main road below the hill.As i watched the light it began to dim out then was suddenly replaced by 4 or 5 large lights,like this,.....,and they started to pulsate in random order.I was shocked and thrilled because i recognized it ,to me,as a ufo and i was saddened because i had not investigated it closer as soon as i saw it.The red lights,as one,started silently moving to the left.I  assumed it went behind some trees because it seemed that i could see branches between me an the lights.All of a sudden the lights were gone,no where to be seen,i looked all around moving my head.I was excited the rest of my shift,(3rd)and i was anxious? because i thought they would come into the building and i did not know what i would do.I reported it to my higher up,cady,lt. and afterwards all the other officers laughed at me and made fun of me,on duty,boy was i mad at them.
content.summary: Large white,solid light dimmed out to be replaced by 4 or5 pulsating red lights.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were on our way to san simion ca, for a one week vacation. we left los angeles about 430 am, at about 6am, we started making our way west on hwy 166 in central ca, it was still very dark, and hwy 166 is a very desolate country road, i noticed up ahead about half a mile, a flashing brilliant blue light, i thought it was just. a light a farmer attached to a pole, as i got closer to it i realized the orb was about the size of a vw bug, i was driving about 60 mph, when i reached the orb, it was about 20 ft off the ground to my left, it stopped flashing for a second or two, then started flashing again, but is was now about 100 ft in the air following my truck,    then it shot over my truck, and was now to the right of me, i looked to my wife, and said, im glad your here, so i have a wittness, then the orb went black for about two seconds, then reappeared about half a mile behind me, this is the first time iv ever seen anything like this, im a licensed pilot, and i know what navigation lights look like, and i know how things fly, but iv never seen anything shoot straight up, then move side to side like this blue object, it was truly unidentified, hope this report helps, thanks, tony in los angeles
content.summary: Witnesses bright blue flashing ufo on hwy 166 in central ca

content.detailedDescription: i submitted this once already a few weeks after event took place.  i have decided to submit it again with the possiblity of video eveidence from a near by public location with 24/7 survaielance which i have not been brave enough to ask for footage.  they prob would not release it to me anyway.  on january 4th 2011 which i believe was a tuesday night, my uncle and i were driving from his home in lititz to molly's gas station in manheim for a casual drive for coffee and cigarettes.  it was app. 8:20pm.  it was me that noticed the orb first pulsating peach in color very high straight ahead as we reached about the trailer park between the 2 towns.  i was driving and chuckling i said" look it's a ufo!"  lancaster airport is only about 10 or less miles back toward lititz.  so i see lights and planes and helicopters daily.  at first it was strange but could have passed as a plane with its lights right at us.  we watched it closely and after heading around bend at doe run elementary school by the pond this object fell from the sky.  we thought it was actually crashing but it did not.  while at this point it is only a few 100 feet away the lights are very bright!  we were in disbelief because this object stopped falling right above school building hovered for a second, spun or maybe lights were just spinning horizontally then diagonally very super fast! then the object took off like spinning was charging it for its extreme take off or something!  it shot like a meteor but did not go straight.  it slithered like a snake in the night sky but first made another sharp turn. i think it was blueish in color when it took off. it was completely silent.  at that point when it took off i stepped on the gas obviously i wasnt going to catch up but i had to try!  the time we got to the light passed the school which is only 200 yds, this thing slithered past the west side of manheim right over town and prob by 283 alraedy out of our range of sight.  it was a very clear night.  i dont understand how we were the only ones who saw or reported this.  their was a car back behind us but who knows if they were too old to notice it or what. my uncle and i dont talk about it too much any lately because the conversation always leads to silence or deep thought.  to be honest this did effect me in some negative ways, but maybe thats because they just wont tell us the truth.  i was in shock for sure when i came home and told my wife. in fact i was in shock for a good week.  if your own wife doesnt believe you who do you tell?  it still worries me but i am much more clear minded and sane:) i just wish i could see it again...And again.  my uncle believes it may have been something of biblical, so i dont push the subject, but we both know it wasn't of our publically known technology.    11/22/11
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: If i had known to record this it would be undoubtable proof considering i know nothing about recording or hoaxing.  it's been 10 months-mind stretching-answerless-very confusing-

content.detailedDescription: I was on my patio smoking and i looked up to see what looked like a night training exercise near pt mugu naval airbase. five objects with the same 4 red pulsating lights and one bright white blinking light circled the base for about 10-12 mins. the flight paths these craft were flying did not match any usual pattern i regularly see, its like they were surrounding the base. they circled around 3 times then one of them made an abrupt left turn, stopped, then headed back towards my direction. suddenly it emitted this super bright light for 2 seconds that looked like it was burning because it flickered eratically. after that, all of the objects split off in different directions slowly fading out and all of them disappeared at different altitudes. the one object that emitted the bright light was last to disappear heading south towards l.A. disappearing below the horizon. shortly after i start hearing jets with their after burners on.. this has been my 3rd sighting in oxnard so far and hope to see more.
content.summary: 5 objects circling pt mugu airbase

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were traveling in his car, and i, then he, spotted something approaching us from the left (north), and he pulled over and parked the car (residential area), and we got out and witnessed this object, which was barely visible in the low cloud ceiling so. ohio gloomy sky.  it practically matched the sky color, and was dead silent, dead slow, and big!  it was a little less than half a football field long (100+ ft), and about 60 feet wide in kind of an oval rectangular shape.  we both looked at each other and affirmed that we were both seeing it.  it passed on over a nearly two minute, ultra slow pass over us, and the 400ft long open field to the south of the car and us.  we spent some time discussing whether or not it could have been some right-patt afb (dayton, oh) skunk work craft, or extra-terrestrial in origin.  i concluded that it was beyond our capacity to have a craft like that, so i am convinced that it was e.T. in nature.  we never spoke about it to very many folks, and most of those were our age, and dismissed it without thinking we were crazy, but we have never made serious reports about it.  he still remembers it like yesterday, as do i.  it would probably require a hypnosis or such to extract the actual date.  this took place about 4 miles north of our homes. i do not know what the upper profile of it was, because the bottom side which we saw was flat in appearance, and the degree to which it blended in with the sky made us unable to see any "thickness" as it approached, as well as after it was past being above us.
content.summary: Matched gray, clouded sky, dead silent, dead slow, virtually invisible

content.detailedDescription: About 7:30 on october 31st my family and i were passing out candy in sarasota. we were on lawn chairs in the driveway facing east. i noticed in the clear sky about 45 degrees above the horizon a light that first looked like a bright star. within 3 or 4 seconds it increased with intensity and then vanished. it did not move from its spot but looked like it simply disappeared. about 15 minutes later it reappeard in about the same spot. this time after about 5 seconds it increased in intensity and then became "hollow" in the middle like a tire or doughnut shape. it continued to slowly increase in brightness for about 3 more seconds before looking like it "melted" or something. i cant even describe it well. almost like its shape got pulled but kind of slowly enough to see it happening.When its shape changed it looked more yellow than white. then it disappeard and that was it.
content.summary: Doughnut shape appears than disappears then appears again and looks like its melting or something

content.detailedDescription:
I wanted to see if i could capture some photo's of the leonid meteor shower so i went to the end of a dark road which falls at the fence of kirtland air force base. i set up my camera and immediately noticed a "star" traveling from east to west at an exceptionally fast rate. all of a sudden it changed direction (to ne), i thought it was a plane at first, then realized it was traveling at a very high rate of speed. all of a sudden, it stopped and began bouncing around in the sky. 

the second "ufo" that i witnessed was mistaken for mars until it began bouncing around in the sky as well. this is not the first time i have witnessed this. in june of this year myself, a friend, and her 12 year old daughter watched something bounce all over the place in the sky for more than an hour and a half. i have audio of that event (just our conversation and reactions). i have seen this a total of three times since june of 2011.

the first time i witnessed these "stars" bouncing around in the sky i felt immediately awestruck, excited, and was in dis-belief that i was watching this happen.  then my excitement turned to fear, and eventually i was grateful to have seen what i saw.  following that sighting i was constantly looking to the night sky to see if i would witness another "ufo".  i eventually stopped obsessing over it because it seemed like it wasn't going to happen.  then, a few months later i saw another one and was excited that it happened again and that i could show the "proof" to my friend who was skeptical of my first account.  when i witnessed the same thing the other day i was very calm and determined to finally get some "proof" with my camera.  all of these events cause me to have a slight fear of "what if they know i'm watching and do something to me", but i don't feel that i am in any kind of danger.  i figure if something were going to happen to me it would have happened by now.  i'm very intrigued, and just wonder what it is that is happening and what they are doing.

*i have audio from the very first sighting if you are interested to hear it.  it mostly has the reactions that my friend, her daughter and i were having while watching the "star" bounce around and change colors.

*i have more pictures to submit if you are interested.  they are just copies of the photo's but zoomed in and cropped.
content.summary: Bouncing lights in the sky while watching leonid metor shower

content.detailedDescription: at a 9/11 memorial, cape may point n.J., b4 ceremony a large helicopter flew over area.  during ceremony noticed object in front of a bright white cloud, no sound, no lights, no movement.  a few other people noticed it in the sky, approx over cape may beach, west of coast guard base.  a thunder storm rolled in over the bay as ceremony ended.  we were able to keep eyes on object while walking to car, drove in direction of object, however storm intensified with heavy rain & lightning and we lost sight of the object.
content.summary: Metallic in color, rectangular shape,
